Uses of Class
bonzai.api.Node

    • Uses of Node in bonzai.api

      Methods in bonzai.api that return Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node AIGameState.getBase(int team)
      Gets the node where the team's hat sits to generate mana and points.
      Node Actor.getLocation()
      Gets the Node that the Actor is currently on.
      Node AIGameState.getLocation(Actor actor)
      Gets the Node that the given Actor is on.
      Node AIGameState.getMyBase()
      Gets the location of your base, which is the Node where your hat starts out on.
      Node Node.getNearby(int dir)
      Gets a node in a certain direction.
      Node AIGameState.getNode(int x, int y)
      Get a specific, Node from the grid
      Methods in bonzai.api that return types with arguments of type Node 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<Node> AIGameState.getPath(Actor start, Node dest, WeightComparator comp)
      Gets the path from an actor to the destination node

      Gets the path from the start node to the destination node

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Determine the next direction to move (calls getPath()- consider caching instead)
